definition: sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
(of singing or speaking) very articulate pronunciation and vocalizing
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
voice change (at puberty)/to alter one's voice (deliberately)/to sound different (when angry etc)
